 2017-10782017-08-15,  ,  IRCC,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of PAULA LYNNE THOMPSON of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Ottawa District Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Ottawa District Office).
